/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with power lines and trees, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades hinting at the architectural diversity of the city. A white garbage truck, a common sight in many cities, is parked on the side of the road, ready to serve its purpose. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The image is bathed in natural light, enhancing the colors and bringing the scene to life.
